bibl.title: The Acts of Phileas, Bishop of Thumis (Including fragments of the Greek Psalter). P. Chester Beatty XV. With a new edition of P. Bodmer XX and Halkin's Latin "Acta". With full facsimile of the C.B. text.
bibl.note: 120 pp. et 34 pll. et 1 fasc. de 18 pp.
bibl.seg: Pietersma Albert (edited with introduction, translation and commentary by), The Acts of Phileas, Bishop of Thumis (Including fragments of the Greek Psalter). P. Chester Beatty XV. With a new edition of P. Bodmer XX and Halkin's Latin "Acta". With full facsimile of the C.B. text. (Cahiers d'Orientalisme. 7.)
Genève, P. Cramer, 1983, 4°, 120 pp. et 34 pll. et 1 fasc. de 18 pp.

C.R. par F. Bolgiani, RSLR 22 (1986) pp. 542-547. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 65 (1985) pp. 245-246. - G.D. Kilpatrick, VigChr 40 (1986) pp. 92-93. - Jacques Liébaert, MSR 42 (1985) pp. 100-101. - Alessandra Lukinovich, MusHelv 43 (1986) p. 272. - P. Maraval, RHPhR 66 (1986) p. 343. - Justin Mossay, Muséon 99 (1986) pp. 195-196. - V. Roisel, NRTh 109 (1987) pp. 453-454. - Cornelia Römer, JHS 110 (1990) pp. 272-273.
